attributes.action: Reverse the policy, of selling playing fields,whether belonging to schools or communities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Successive governments,have been keen, to allow the selling of our green spaces,to any private contractor,for purposes of building offices,houses etc,in a market driven agenda.This has been to the detriment of our communities,in particular our young people.Hardest hit are the inner cities.How can a government preach "healthy living"whilst depriving all people,of the spaces that are vital to play ball sports,run and exercise dogs? More green spaces,also mean ,more areas of bio-diversity,and is more aesthetically pleasing,whilst the non-school variety ,provide a focal point for communities.
